examples: Sometimes darkness can show you the light.
The spy stole across the border under the cover of darkness.
In the darkness, he was blind as a bat, relying on his memory to navigate his own home.
We managed to lose our pursuers in the darkness.

Instead of criticizing our politicians for not doing enough to combat climate change, it's better to light a candle than to curse the darkness by taking small actions in our daily lives to reduce our carbon footprint.
words.defineEn: the quality of being dark in color
words.defineVi: chất lượng của màu tối

examples: Is that brightness, Andy? -
Small changes in mass produce enormous changes in a main sequence star's brightness.
You've got your lighting control, change modes, change brightness.
The peak brightness is only 300.
The max brightness is 450 nits.
words.defineEn: the quality or degree of being bright in color
words.defineVi: chất lượng hoặc mức độ sáng màu

examples: The lightness is there.
It really adds this nice lightness, a little bit of crispiness.
And the insane lightness, mice are gonna keep getting better.
However, I want a third button and the side buttons and really on the body in terms of lightness there's not much to comment on.
It might be and lightness isn't everything, as we're about to discover, there's other factors that make a good mouse like shape.
words.defineEn: ‌the quality of being light or pale in color
words.defineVi: chất lượng của ánh sáng hoặc màu nhạt

examples: The golden skin of the loquat contrasts beautifully with its vibrant orange flesh.
He wasted a golden opportunity when he missed from the penalty spot.
We tried golden and crispy fryer chicken nuggets as a tasty snack.
The chef roasted the Brussels sprouts until they turned golden brown.
Want to spend your golden years in Europe?
words.defineEn: having a bright yellow color or colored like the metal gold
words.defineVi: có màu vàng sáng hoặc có màu giống như vàng kim loại

examples: Prospectors have hit gold.
To work gold.
Some high-end restaurants use gold leaf as a garnish for desserts and other dishes.
Tickets for the concert are like gold dust.
This information is as good as gold.
words.defineEn: having a deep yellow color or the color of gold
words.defineVi: có màu vàng đậm hoặc màu vàng

examples: The Canadian team handed the game to them on a silver plate.
The boy was born with a silver spoon in his mouth.
He now rocks a distinguished look with his silver strands.
There is no silver bullet that will put an end to unemployment.
If you sell your share in the company now, you're handing the ownership to him on a silver platter.
words.defineEn: having a shiny, grayish-white color or the color of the metal silver
words.defineVi: có màu trắng xám sáng bóng hoặc màu của bạc kim loại

examples: Emmeline turned pale.
Emmeline turned pale.
Her recent conduct is beyond the pale.
His opinions are entirely beyond the pale.
The language my father used was beyond the pale.
words.defineEn: light in color or shade
words.defineVi: ánh sáng trong màu sắc hoặc bóng râm

examples: "That boy isn't very bright."
These shrubs produce bright red berries.
The bird had bright feathers and a long beak.
Some bright spark left the tap running all night.
I arrived bright and early at Brian the falconer's house for day one of my course.
words.defineEn: (of colors) strong and easy to see; having a vivid color
words.defineVi: (về màu sắc) mạnh mẽ và dễ nhìn; có màu sắc sặc sỡ

examples: The colorful bird flew high in the sky.
The children decorated their cupcakes on a colorful dish.
The children drank their juice from colorful plastic glasses.
The colorful fish in the aquarium captured my attention.
The colorful bowtie pasta added a fun twist to the classic mac and cheese dish.
words.defineEn: having a lot of different colors or full of bright colors
words.defineVi: có rất nhiều màu sắc khác nhau hoặc đầy màu sắc tươi sáng

examples: Most colored diamonds owe their hue to some kind of chemical impurity in their carbon lattice.
The dark colored patch feels warmer in the sunlight than the light colored patch.
The colored water from the cup moved up through the celery stalk.
What’s your favorite colored leaf?
Then put the celery in the colored water!
words.defineEn: having a particular color other than black or white
words.defineVi: có một màu cụ thể khác với màu đen hoặc trắng

examples: The chef drizzled cream over the warm apple pie.
Double cream adds indulgence to creamy pasta sauces.
Milk and cream should keep quite well in a fridge.
The hair styling cream included an emulsifier to combine the water and styling agents.
She prefers her coffee black, without any sugar or cream.
words.defineEn: having a light yellowish-white color
words.defineVi: có màu trắng vàng nhạt

examples: A better teacher would have licked him into shape.
Wow, Jim has really gotten in shape lately.
We learn about shapes and measurements in our math class.
The ugli fruit's bright orange color and unique shape make it a fun and eye-catching addition to fruit platters.
Hey, don't get all bent out of shape!
words.defineEn: a specific figure such as a square, etc.
words.defineVi: một hình cụ thể như hình vuông, v.v.

examples: The center will serve the whole community.
They drove a flock of sheep through the center of the city.
The bus station is located in the city center.
He lives far from the city center.
The hollow center of rigatoni allows it to hold robust sauces and fillings.
words.defineEn: the middle part or point of an area, space, or object
words.defineVi: phần giữa hoặc điểm của một khu vực, không gian, hoặc đối tượng

examples: The playful dog chased its tail in circles.
The line cuts the circle at two points.
When it came to cooking, he ran circles around the rest of his family.
Their affair was an open secret in army circles.
I'm just talking in circles at this point.
words.defineEn: a completely round, plain shape
words.defineVi: một hình dạng hoàn toàn tròn, đơn giản

examples: Fingers crossed!
I crossed the street carefully at the pedestrian crosswalk.
Speaking that rudely to your teacher definitely crosses the line.
This article crossed a line and I am disgusted.
Crossing path with an old friend is always a pleasure.
words.defineEn: a mark or an object formed by two short lines or pieces crossing each other (+ or ×)
words.defineVi: một nhãn hiệu hoặc một đối tượng được hình thành bởi hai dòng hoặc mảnh ngắn giao nhau (+ hoặc ×)

examples: They decorate the town square for holidays and special occasions.
The demonstrators marched in a body to the main square.
The people gathered in the town square to celebrate the victory.
If this doesn't work we're back to square one.
We'll have to go back at square one if the government pulls our funding on this project.
words.defineEn: a shape with four equal straight sides and four right angles (90°)
words.defineVi: một hình có bốn cạnh thẳng bằng nhau và bốn góc vuông (90°)

examples: The diamond thief double-crossed his partners and gave them only worthless fake jewels.
The diamonds appeared to be genuine.
My grandfather was a bit of a rough diamond.
The thug threw dust in her eyes and exchanged her real diamonds with fake stones.
The speaker's slight stuttering did not detract from the power of her message, as a diamond with a flaw is better than a common stone that is perfect.
words.defineEn: a shape with four straight sloping sides of equal length, with one point facing directly up and the other directly down
words.defineVi: một hình có bốn cạnh dốc thẳng có chiều dài bằng nhau, với một điểm hướng thẳng lên trên và điểm kia hướng thẳng xuống

examples: The stars twinkled brightly in the dark night sky.
She counted zero stars in the sky.
The night sky is filled with stars and a beautiful moon.
In the world of sports, a star athlete can be considered a big shot.
The night sky is black, except for the stars and the moon.
words.defineEn: a shape with five or more points, representing a star in the sky
words.defineVi: một hình có năm điểm trở lên, tượng trưng cho một ngôi sao trên bầu trời

examples: Health services are lining the drug companies’ pockets, according to the report.
The line cuts the circle at two points.
The actress was practicing her lines before the audition.
Your remarks were really out of line.
Remuneration is in line with comparable international organizations.
words.defineEn: a long narrow mark on a surface
words.defineVi: một dấu hẹp dài trên một bề mặt

examples: Our family line has presided over this land from the year dot.
I've known Peter since the year dot.
the European Council will seize the opportunity to cross the t's and dot the i's.
Please make sure to dot your i's and cross your t's when signing this contract.
I made sure to cross my t's and dot my
words.defineEn: a small, round mark or spot
words.defineVi: một dấu nhỏ, tròn hoặc đốm

examples: To hear both sides of the argument.
His arms dropped limply to his sides.
The manager played his strongest side of the season.
On the credit side, the restaurant offers a wide range of choices.
The restaurant served their fish and chips with a side of brown sauce.
words.defineEn: the right or left half of an object, place, or surface
words.defineVi: nửa bên phải hoặc bên trái của một đối tượng, địa điểm hoặc bề mặt

examples: Current drilling technology thus barely scrapes the surface.
Sunlight played on the surface of the lake.
The children skipped stones across the calm river surface.
When his head broke the surface he took in deep gulps of air.
The boat hit against an object under the surface of the water.
words.defineEn: the upper or exterior boundary of something
words.defineVi: ranh giới trên hoặc bên ngoài của một cái gì đó

examples: She guessed the answer straight away.
The guard stood straight as a ramrod.
They clicked straight away.
He gives it to you straight.
Sometimes he spoke straight from the shoulder and sometimes in puzzles
words.defineEn: without bending or curving in any angle or direction
words.defineVi: không uốn cong hoặc uốn cong theo bất kỳ góc độ hoặc hướng nào

examples: The theory falls flat on its face when put into practice.
The couple in the flat upstairs are always at it hammer and tongs.
We drove through the night flat-out, with the pedal to the metal.
He threw caution to the winds and rang the bell of the ground-floor flat.
For the record, I have never been to the flat.
words.defineEn: (of a surface) continuing in a straight line with no raised or hollow parts
words.defineVi: (của một bề mặt) tiếp tục theo một đường thẳng không có phần nhô lên hoặc phần rỗng

examples: My debts are a millstone round my neck.
The hairstylist used a round brush to create curls.
Glaring round at the solitary embryo sheepskin, who quaked in his shoes.
The mortgage on it has turned into a real yoke round my neck.
You can buy strawberries all year round, but at a price.
words.defineEn: shaped like a circle or ball; having the shape or form of a circle or ball
words.defineVi: có hình tròn hoặc quả bóng; có hình dạng hoặc dạng của một vòng tròn hoặc quả bóng

examples: I draw the line at a pizza with anchovies on it.
She drew a yellow sun on the corner of the paper.
She drew a picture of a hand with five fingers.
he battle lines has been drawn for years.
The battle lines were drawn yesterday for the fiercest contest in the history of local radio.
words.defineEn: to make a picture of something using a pencil, pen, etc. without painting it
words.defineVi: để tạo ra một bức tranh về một cái gì đó bằng bút chì, bút mực, v.v. mà không vẽ nó

examples: The color green has a restful effect.
The ocean's blue color amazed us.
That color has gone out of fashion.
What is your favorite color?
The artist mixed different colors to create a masterpiece.
words.defineEn: to change the color of something; to put color on something
words.defineVi: để thay đổi màu sắc của một cái gì đó; để đặt màu trên một cái gì đó

examples: The whole is sometime less than the sum of its parts.
The Siemens display goes the whole hog.
The center will serve the whole community.
The whole may be smaller than the sum of its parts!
The whole procedure is as easy as ABC.
words.defineEn: complete or including every part
words.defineVi: hoàn thành hoặc bao gồm mọi phần

examples: The book paints a vivid picture of life in the city.

He painted a beautiful portrait of his sister.
She painted her toenails a vibrant shade of red for the beach vacation.
Its characters are painted in broad brushstrokes.
words.defineEn: a colored liquid that you put on the surface of a wall, etc. to decorate or protect it
words.defineVi: một chất lỏng có màu mà bạn bôi lên bề mặt tường, v.v. để trang trí hoặc bảo vệ nó

examples: The car ahead of me jumped the light.
The lights changed to green.
Sometimes darkness can show you the light.
A major technological advancement like that is still light years away.
This software first saw the light of day back in 1993.
words.defineEn: having less amount of color; not dark
words.defineVi: có ít màu hơn; không tối
